issue.title: *** New SubT Simulation docker image available on DockerHub ***

content.raw:
Martin,

Thank for testing and confirm this. I’m glad it is now working for you.

Regarding using `xhost +`, we cannot recommend that. Therefore, it’s up to each team’s system policies to decide that. Option 1, should work remotely though.
content.html:
Martin,

Thank for testing and confirm this. I’m glad it is now working for you.

Regarding using xhost +, we cannot recommend that. Therefore, it’s up to each team’s system policies to decide that. Option 1, should work remotely though.
